00002 #include <stdlib.h>
00003 #include <string.h>
00004 #include "analyserpxFile.h"

00006 
00007 void writeStringToLogFile(const char *fileName, const char *str,
00008                           char *errbuff)
00009 {
00010     FILE *logs = fopen(fileName, "a+");
00011     if (!logs) {
00012         if (errbuff != NULL) {
00013             snprintf(errbuff,strlen("\nError openning log file: \n")+strlen(fileName)+1, "\nError openning log file: %s\n", fileName);
00014         }
00015         return;
00016     }
00017     fprintf(logs, "%s\n", str);
00018     closeFile(logs);
00019 }
00020 
00021 FILE *openFile(const char *fileName, const char *mode, char *errbuff,
00022                char *logFile)
00023 {
00024     FILE *p = fopen(fileName, mode);
00025     if (!p) {
00026         if (errbuff != NULL) {
00027             strncpy(errbuff, "",1);
00028             snprintf(errbuff, strlen("\nError openning file: \n")+strlen(fileName)+1,"\nError openning file: %s\n", fileName);
00029 
00030             if (logFile != NULL) {
00031                 writeStringToLogFile(logFile, errbuff, errbuff);
00032             }
00033             return NULL;
00034         }
00035     }
00036     return p;
00037 }
00038 
00039 void closeFile(FILE * p)
00040 {
00041     if (p == NULL)
00042         return;
00043     fclose(p);
00044 }
00045 
00046 long getSizeofFile(char *fileName)
00047 {
00048     FILE *file = openFile(fileName, "r", NULL, NULL);
00049     long size = 0;
00050     if (file == NULL)
00051         return size;
00052     fseek(file, 0, SEEK_END);
00053     size = ftell(file);
00054     fclose(file);
00055     return size;
00056 }
00057 
00058 int existFile(char *fileName)
00059 {
00060     FILE *f = fopen(fileName, "r");
00061     if (f == NULL)
00062         return 0;
00063     else
00064         closeFile(f);
00065     return 1;
00066 }
00067 
00068 int deleteFile(char *fileName)
00069 {
00070     if (existFile(fileName)) {
00071         return remove(fileName);
00072     }
00073     return 0;
00074 }
